com.socrata.api

Class Soda2Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socrata.api.Soda2Base
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Soda2Consumer

    public class Soda2Base
extends Object
    A base class that wraps some common SODA 2 behaviours around an HttpLowLevel object.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse query(String resourceId,
                                             javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                             SoqlQuery query)
                                               throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                      SodaError
        Runs a query against a SODA2 resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        query - The query to be executed against the resource.
        Returns:
        a response containing the response stream, if the request is successful
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • query

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse query(String resourceId,
                                             javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                             String query)
                                               throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                      SodaError
        Runs a query against a SODA2 resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        query - The query string to be executed against the resource. This should NOT be URL encoded.
        Returns:
        The results from the operation
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • getById

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse getById(String resourceId,
                                               javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                               String uniqueId)
                                                 throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                        SodaError
        Load a single object based on it's unique ID. This id can either be based on a dataset specific unique column, or the system ID created for each row.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        uniqueId - Id based on a dataset specific unique column, or the system ID created for each row.
        Returns:
        a response containing the response stream, if the request is successful.
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • doAdd

        public <T> com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse doAdd(String resourceId,
                                                 T object)
                                               throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                      SodaError
        Adds a single row to a dataset.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        object - The object that should be serialized to JSON and added to the dataset. Jackson is used for serialization and deserialization.
        Returns:
        The results from the operation
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • doAddObjects

        public <T> com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse doAddObjects(String resourceId,
                                                        Collection<T> objects)
                                                      throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                             SodaError
        Adds a collection of rows to a dataset.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        objects - The objects that should be serialized to JSON and added to the dataset. Jackson is used for serialization and deserialization.
        Returns:
        The results from the operation
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • doAddStream

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse doAddStream(String resourceId,
                                                   javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                                   InputStream stream)
                                                     throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                            SodaError
        Adds a collection of rows to a dataset, but does so by simply streaming a datastream to the SODA2 server. Whether the stream is JSON or CSV is set by the mediaType
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        mediaType - The media type for the stream (normally JSON or CSV)
        stream - The objects to add, already serialized in a stream.
        Returns:
        The results from the operation
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • doUpdate

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse doUpdate(String resourceId,
                                                Object uniqueId,
                                                Object object)
                                                  throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                         SodaError
        Update an object.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The id of the resource to query. This can either be the resource endpoint name set in the metadata, or the unique ID given to the resource.
        uniqueId - Id based on a dataset specific unique column, or the system ID created for each row.
        object - The object that should be serialized to JSON and added to the dataset. Jackson is used for serialization and deserialization.
        Returns:
        The results from the operation
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.
